title: Gragas misses Barrel Roll and Body Slam;
body:
But it's k he'll just auto you for 300 damage at level 6 before you get under turret then ult you for the supp and adc to kill np ty Riot.

Bro I would ward that sh*t but he gets a free tribrush ward clear during his consistent and fast jungle clearing and pink wards don't help either because you can't actually stop him from killing it in 90% of occasions and pinks r expensive and he can circumvent most wards anyway and come from basically anywhere and once he gets sweeper there's basically nothing you can do about his tribrush clearing and easy circumvention of wards.

replies.body: Just because someone can clear a ward, doesn't mean the ward is useless. If you see him clearing the ward its already done its job

> [{quoted}](name=McRuthless,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RV7tKfn5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-08T21:38:10.649+0000)
>
> Just because someone can clear a ward, doesn't mean the ward is useless. If you see him clearing the ward its already done its job

if you see it disappear you can assume its time to get out of there

Yeah but if it's a River Brush ward that he's cleared you can't actually go within 600 range of that brush then he just pinks and clears Dragon and now has basically uncontestable Dragon control if their mid lane is aware of the contesting of Dragon control plus he takes 4 people to actually force out of your jungle and in most cases wont actually die - much like if he ward clears tribrush you can't actually go near the tribrush which gives mid laners easier gank potential if you haven't warded behind Dragon pit but in most cases he has done strategy A). and cleared River brush or Dragon then proceeded to camp River brush which support will pink for him to then clear: congratulations; you have now lost bot and Dragon control for the foreseeable future and will probably get ganked by mid coming from River rather than behind Drag; you can no longer engage on the enemy bot lane unless you see him somewhere else on the map and even if he is somewhere else on the map if mid is miss you can't engage anyway god forbid Leblanc come and destroy you in 2 seconds and if you try to ward clear tribrush with pink you can guarantee he will come destroy it meaning you have to go buy another pink if you didn't already buy 2 and even if you did he'll probably just come back again when you re-ward it: congratulations you are down 200g and Gragas has only spent 40 seconds of his life to waste it: if you try to re-ward side brush when you think he has gone: he will isntagib said heroic support warder; if you do manage to re-ward it he will come back and destroy it leaving you unable to re-ward it until you see him somewhere else on the map: actually countering his insane ward destruction capabilities requires a Vi and Malzahar because they're about the only 2 that can lock him down and hurt him enough to stop him just E'ing from your engage and to top it all off about the only thing you can do is blue trinket tribrush and side brush every so often because this is about the only way you can actually check if he's camping you but it has a ridiculously long cooldown.

He's basically a perma-ban just because this is his whole life: be tank and clear wards, gank unstoppably and be immune to basically any form of heavy engage or poke whilst being a tank and be impossible to kite or chase down because of an insane amount of CC and sustain and there's little any Champion can do about it.

I think one way to deal with Gragas is to pick a decent tank that's mobile for counter ganking but still offers CC for teamfights. {{champion:120}} 
But I don't think any other champion can actually top a {{champion:79}} At the moment.
By the way, every other jungler in the game can also smite raptors, so its not like this is something that makes gragas more powerful than anyone else lol
